room_title: Escape room "Locker Room" by Escape Room Palm Springs in Palm Springs
review: Katelyn or K$ was an awesome host. today for team building 7 of us tried this for the first time ever. Some clues were harder than others and a few hints along the way but we all worked together and escaped.

room_title: Escape room "Locker Room" by Escape Room Palm Springs in Palm Springs
review: Such a fun and exciting experience! It was a nail biter to the end, making it out with only 16 seconds to spare. My group did the Locker room and it was challenging and required all of our combined effort. Definitely would recommend to anyone in the Palm Springs area. Shoutout to our room assistant Lyssa, she was fantastic and helpful when we needed!

room_title: Escape room "Locker Room" by Escape Room Palm Springs in Palm Springs
review: We had so much fun with the bank heist we decided to do the locker room. Both rooms had great hosts. The locker room victim played the part well.When we return to the desert we will do the others.Definitely a good time.

room_title: Escape room "Locker Room" by Escape Room Palm Springs in Palm Springs
review: Had a great time with my family an Em was great to work with. We were able to escape the locker room. Can't wait to go back and do another escape room!

room_title: Escape room "Locker Room" by Escape Room Palm Springs in Palm Springs
review: We have done over 30 escape rooms and we had a great time escaping the Locker Room. Cristina (OG) our game master was great, our kids (11-year-old twins) liked the room and we escaped with almost 7 min left.We will be back for sure to try another room!

room_title: Escape room "Locker Room" by Escape Room Palm Springs in Palm Springs
review: Escape Room was fun for the whole family. Our group of 9 had a great time working together to solve the Locker Room puzzles. Everyone was engaged and played a part in our escape success. It was challenging and the mind bending puzzle promoted team work and outside the box thinking. We all had a part in our successful escape. The hints they gave along the way were thought promoting and helpful without being obvious. Martha, our "hostage" was a critical part of solving the puzzle. Our family thoroughly enjoyed the experience and we'll be back!
